name: Flash Fire
summary: Activated if the opponent uses a Fire-type move on the user. The user is immune to Fire-moves, and the power of Fire-type moves is increased to 1.5x. While further boosts don't exist, the user is still immune to Fire moves. Not activated by the burn status.
viability: Flash Fire is a great ability, if you are able to predict a Fire type move. Especially with Fire Blast, that turns into a 180 base-power move, not considering STAB.
